long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
📸 Instagram Post Scraper

This powerful Chrome extension allows you to easily scrape and analyze data from Instagram posts. 🚀

Key Features:
• 🔍 Search by Instagram username
• 🔢 Set limit for posts to scrape (up to 5000 per task)
• 👆 One-click data collection
• 📊 Export data in multiple formats: CSV, JSON, HTML, Excel, XML
• ✅ Customizable export fields
• 📜 View and manage historical tasks and data
• 🏪 Discover more useful extensions powered by us

Data include:
• 📅 Collect post date and time
• ❤️ Gather likes and comments count
• 📝 Extract post captions and hashtags
• 🖼️ Retrieve image URLs
• 🎥 Collect video view counts (for video posts)
• 📍 Get location data (if available)
• 🔗 Capture post URLs for easy access

Ideal for:
• 📈 Market research
• 🧐 Content analysis
• 📡 Social media monitoring
• 🕵️ Competitor analysis
• 🎯 Influencer marketing

How to use:
1. 🛠️ After installation, click the extension icon in the toolbar
2. ✏️ Enter the target Instagram username
3. 🔢 Set the number of posts you want to scrape
4. 🚀 Click the "Start" button
5. ⏳ Wait for data collection to complete
6. 💾 Choose your preferred format and download the data

Important notes:
• 📜 This extension is an independent creation and is not affiliated with or endorsed by instagram❗️

This extension provides a fast, efficient, and flexible solution for your Instagram data collection needs. Whether you're a marketing professional, content creator, researcher, or data analyst, you'll find immense value in this versatile tool. 💼🎨🔬📊

🚀 Install now and unlock the power of Instagram data!
